ggit.database module

DataSource

class ggit.database.data_source.DataSource(*args, **kwargs)

This class is a simple wrapper for the neo4j driver, which is used to create a session with the database.

It is a singleton class, so it can be accessed from anywhere in the application and the instance will be the same.

The credentials for the database are retrieved using the ggit.managers.ConfigManager class.

driver

The neo4j driver used to create a session with the database.

Type

neo4j.Driver

Parameters

uri (str) – The uri of the database.

close()

Method used to close the connection with the database.

get_driver() → Driver

Method to obtain the instance of the neo4j driver.

Returns

The neo4j driver.

Return type

neo4j.Driver

new_session() → Session

Method used to create a new session with the database. It is used as a context manager, so it can be used with the with statement.

Returns

The neo4j session.

Return type

neo4j.Session

BlobRepository

class ggit.database.blob_repository.BlobRepository(data_source: DataSource)

This repository class implements methods to add, get and delete blobs from the database. It uses the DataSource class to create a session with the database and execute queries.

data_source

The DataSource object used to create a session with the database.

Type

ggit.database.DataSource

add_blob(blob: Blob) → bool

This method adds a blob to the database, creating a node with the hash, length and content properties.

Parameters

blob (ggit.entities.Blob) – The blob to be added to the database.

Returns

True if the blob was added successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

delete_blob(hash: str) → bool

This method deletes a blob from the database, given its hash. All relationships on the found blob are detached.

Parameters

hash (str) – The hash of the blob to be deleted.

Returns

True if the blob was deleted successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

get_all_blobs() → List[Blob]

This method gets all the blobs from the database.

Returns

The list of blobs retrieved from the database.

Return type

List[ggit.entities.Blob]

get_blob(hash: str) → Blob

This method gets a blob from the database, given its hash.

Parameters

hash (str) – The hash of the blob to be retrieved.

Returns

The blob retrieved from the database.

Return type

ggit.entities.Blob

CommitRepository

class ggit.database.commit_repository.CommitRepository

This repository class implements methods to add, get and delete commits from the database. It uses the DataSource class to create a sessione with the database and execute queries.

data_source

The data source used to create a session with the database.

Type

DataSource

delete_commit(hash: str) → bool

This method deletes a commit from the database given its hash, and all the relationships that it has with other nodes. The tree contained in the commit is not deleted, as it may be contained in other commits, mereover, the author and committer of the commit are not deleted, as they may have authored or committed other commits.

Parameters

hash (str) – The hash of the commit to delete.

Returns

True if the commit was deleted, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

get_all_commits() → List[Commit]

This method gets all the commits from the database.

Returns

A list of all the commits in the database.

Return type

List[Commit]

TreeRepository

class ggit.database.tree_repository.TreeRepository(data_source: DataSource)

This repository class implements methods to add, get and delete trees from the database. It uses the DataSource class to create a session with the database and execute queries.

data_source

The data source used to create a session with the database.

Type

ggit.database.DataSource

add_tree(tree: Tree) → Tuple[bool, int]

This method adds a tree to the database, managing all the nodes and relationships that are part of the tree. It uses an instance of the ggit.database.BlobRepository class to add the blobs to the database.

Parameters

tree (ggit.entities.Tree) – The tree to be added to the database.

Returns

A tuple containing a boolean value that indicates if the tree was added successfully and the number of nodes created, useful information given that the method is used recursively.

Return type

Tuple[bool, int]

delete_tree(hash: str) → bool

This method deletes a tree from the database given its hash. All relationships and nodes that are related to the tree are deleted.

Parameters

hash (str) – The hash of the tree to be deleted.

Returns

A boolean value that indicates if the tree was deleted successfully.

Return type

bool

get_all_trees() → List[Tree]

This method gets all the trees from the database.

Returns

A list containing all the trees in the database.

Return type

List[ggit.entities.Tree]

get_tree(hash: str) → Tree

This method gets a tree from the database given its hash. It makes use of the ggit.utils.nodes_utils.parse_tree() function to parse the tree given the nodes obtained from the database and the hash of the top tree in the relations.

Parameters

hash (str) – The hash of the tree to be retrieved.

Returns

The tree retrieved from the database.

Return type

ggit.entities.Tree

UserRepository

class ggit.database.user_repository.UserRepository(data_source: DataSource)

This repository is used to store and retrieve users from the database. It uses the DataSource class to create a session with the database and execute queries.

data_source

The DataSource object used to create a session with the database.

Type

ggit.database.DataSource

add_user(user: User) → bool

This method adds a user to the database, creating a node with the name and email properties.

Parameters

user (ggit.entities.User) – The user to be added to the database.

Returns

True if the user was added successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

delete_user(name: str, email: str) → bool

This method deletes a user from the database, given its name and email.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the user to be deleted.

  • email (str) – The email of the user to be deleted.

Returns

True if the user was deleted successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

get_all_users() → List[User]

This method gets all the users from the database.

Returns

The list of users retrieved from the database.

Return type

List[ggit.entities.User]

get_user(name: str, email: str) → User

This method gets a user from the database, given its name and email.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the user to be retrieved.

  • email (str) – The email of the user to be retrieved.

Returns

The user retrieved from the database.

Return type

ggit.entities.User
